_auditNote: PRICE VERIFICATION UPDATE 2026-02-17: One price was user-verified and corrected: WD Elements 8TB External HDD changed from $149.99 to $209.99 (pricePerTB updated from 18.75 to 26.25). All other 77 prices could NOT be verified automatically due to: missing Brave API key for web search, retailer sites blocking automated access (Amazon, Newegg, B&H, Best Buy), manufacturer sites using dynamic JavaScript pricing (Samsung, WD, Seagate). All unverified prices are marked with priceVerified: false and include verification notes. RECOMMENDATION: Either configure web search API key (openclaw configure --section web) and/or use manual browser verification for remaining products. Total: 78 products (1 verified, 77 unverified).
